publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1445 Mr Brian Monteith: Motion of No Confidence-That the Parliament has no confidence in Sam Galbraith as a member of the Scottish Executive. Supported by: David McLetchie*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Phil Gallie*, Alex Johnstone*, Alex Fergusson*, Nick Johnston*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1445 Motion of No Confidence (lodged on 8 December 2000) Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, John Young*, Ben Wallace*, Mr David Davidson*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-1445 Motion of No Confidence (lodged on 8 December 2000) David Mundell*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, John Scott*

S1M-1445 Mr Brian Monteith: Motion of No Confidence-That the Parliament has no confidence in Sam Galbraith as a member of the Scottish Executive. Supported by: David McLetchie, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Phil Gallie, Alex Johnstone, Alex Fergusson, Nick Johnston, Bill Aitken, Mr Keith Harding, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr Jamie McGrigor, John Young, Ben Wallace, Mr David Davidson, Mary Scanlon, David Mundell, Miss Annabel Goldie, John Scott
